column4: How do I control which process start at boot time?  I noticed when I rebooted the other day that services are running that I do not need/want.  I use KDM, but when I shutdown KDM and GDM both have to stop.  I also installed tremulous (a first person shooter) and when I shutdown it says something like "stopping tremulous dedicated server."  I don't run a tremulous server so I don't need that running in the background
you sure you didn't install the 'tremulous-server' package as well?
just remove it; you don't need it just to play trem
